title: Bulletin board: Oct. 18
text:
Next 
Baseball 
Camp: Pitcher/Catcher Camp at CAK on Nov. 21, 9 a.m.-2:30 p.m. and Nov. 22, 2:30-5 p.m. Fee: $125. 
Players: Knoxville Nationals 13u looking for one or two experienced players for 2015/2016 season. 865-300-9677 or knoxvillenationalsbaseball@yahoo.com 
Signups: East TN Prospect Games for 2016-2019 high-school graduates at ETSU on Oct. 25 at 9 a.m. Sign up at prepbaseballreport.com/tennessee/events. Fees: $175 for pitcher or position player only, $225 for two-way position player and pitcher. fuller@prepbaseballreport.com or byrd@prepbaseballreport.com. 
Basketball 
Signups: Knoxville Falcons signups for boys and girls ages 4-14 at Christenberry Park Maintenance Building, Tuesdays and Thursdays through Nov. 5 and on Oct. 24, 31, and Nov. 7. 865-216-1065. 
Golf 
Fundraiser: Oak Ridge High School Baseball golf tournament fundraiser for 2016 season at Centennial Golf Course on Oct. 31 at 9 a.m. Fees: $80 per person or $320 per team. 865-659-4481. 
Softball 
Camp: SEAA Halloween Spooktacular tournament for ages 6u-18u at Willow Creek Ballpark on Saturday. Three games guaranteed. Fees: 6u and 8u $25, 10u-18u $100, all teams $12 sanction fee. 865-604-4000 or 865-599-2944. 
POLICY 
The News Sentinel sports department publishes announcements of sports-related meetings, tournaments, speakers and the like in the Bulletin Board as a public service. 
Deadline for Sunday items is noon Friday. There is no charge for Bulletin Board items. However, because of space limitations, we can publish items only once and the News Sentinel reserves the right to refuse any submission. 
Bulletin Board items must be submitted in writing, either in person, by mail (2332 News Sentinel Drive, Knoxville, TN., 37921-5761) by fax (865-342-6106) or by email (sports@knoxnews.com).
